CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01B02

TITLE.P: Establishment of DPS 27 Lots for a range of food supplies to all ATU sites.

SHORT_DESCR.P: ATU wishes to establish a Dynamic Purchasing System (DPS) for food supplies for all ATU sites, covering products including but not limited to: fruit, vegetables, prepared potatoes, salads, milk, dairy products, eggs, bread, morning goods, fresh meat, fresh poultry, fresh fish, meat alternatives, dried products, confectionary, soft drinks, frozen foods and specialist sustainable/organic food supplies.
The DPS will be in place for a minimum of 5 years with an approximate spend of €5m and will be the main procurement route for the Atlantic Technological University Food requirements.
The DPS is open for applications until 1st September 2026 as a minimum.
